about_the_game:
The content of this DLC includes:
Purchase to acquire the dual action hunter hero:Forrester, and three of Forrester's treasures: Elf Bow, Elf Leather Armor, and Agile Dagger.
Forrester can attack from range as well as melee. In addition, he can be the leader of the hunter in the team, increasing the aid for all his hunter Allies at the start of the battle.
Background:
Forrester grew up in the depths of the forest, and his elven ancestry gave him extraordinary senses, so few prey could escape from his arrows. Unconstrained by bow strings and arrows, Forrester's lithe posture allows him to pull a dagger from his waist and deal with close enemies. Forrester devoted himself to nature, and when the ecology he loved was facing destruction, Forrester realized that his arrow had to go much further.

name: 放置勇者：远征/Idle Heroes:Odyssey-弗雷斯特Forrester

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7 or 10
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7 or 10
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
